name: Sit Up Simulator: Championship League
description:
Think you got what it takes to be the next Sit Up League Champion? Huh? Do ya punk?

Sit up your way through six chaotic levels and meet a huge cast of characters along the way. And maybe,  just maybe—you won't make a complete fool of yourself.

Sources:

Role music: Bacterial Love

Monplasir: Level2 Level 4

Hell Background

Kevin Macleoud: Itty Bitty 8-Bit

David Renda: 8-Bit Retro Funk

Komiku: Ending/ The Beach/ Skate

Francis Preve: Plaidness
